966140.name: MagicJam
966140.description:
Pick up a controller and join Ricky on his adventure through the 90's Funk-O-tron game machine. There are 4 different themes to choose from, each have their own weird quirks that make a unique cartoon like experience.

Below is a break down of the content that early access will inlcude.Each level inlcudes 1 enemy and 1 Boss. After a year we will have another level called the Barbarian gounds that will inlcue 1 enemy and 1 Boss.
Early access:

⦁ level 1: Funky Town
⦁ level 2: Roller Derby
⦁ level 3: Radical Surfing
⦁ level 4: Silver Space
After a year
⦁ level 5: Barbarian grounds
966140.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
